titleStmt.title: Prayers appointed to be vsed in the church at morning and euening prayer by euery minister, for the Queenes safe deliuerance Set foorth and inioyned by authoritie.
Liturgies. Special forms of prayer (General, 1605)
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Prayers for the Queenes safe deliuerance.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
